PERSONA.NAME: King Henry the Fourth
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Father to Prince Henry, old and on his deathbed.

PERSONA.NAME: Prince Henry
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Prince of Wales, later crowned King Henry V

PERSONA.NAME: Prince John of Lancaster
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Third son to King Henry and brethern to Henry V

PERSONA.NAME: Humphrey, Duke of Gloucester
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Youngest son to King Henry and brethern to Henry V

PERSONA.NAME: Thomas, Duke of Clarence
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Second son to King Henry and brethern to Henry V

PERSONA.NAME: Richard Scroop, Archbishop of York
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Leader of the rebellion against King Henry IV.

PERSONA.NAME: Lord Mowbray
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Against King Henry IV, later executed.

PERSONA.NAME: Lord Hastings
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Against King Henry IV, later executed.

PERSONA.NAME: Travers
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Against King Henry IV, retainer of Northumberland

PERSONA.NAME: Morton
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Against King Henry IV, retainer of Northumberland

PERSONA.NAME: Sir John Colevile
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: A rebel knight in the King's party

PERSONA.NAME: Sir John Blunt
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: A knight in the King's party

PERSONA.NAME: Gower
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: In the King's party, assistant to the Lord Chief Justice

PERSONA.NAME: Harcourt
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: A knight in the King's party

PERSONA.NAME: Lord Chief Justice
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: In the King's party, nemesis of Falstaff.

PERSONA.NAME: Sir John Falstaff
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: An irregular humorist and fallen aristocrat.

PERSONA.NAME: Shallow
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Robert Shallow, a country justice of the peace. Cousin to Silence.

PERSONA.NAME: Silence
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: A country justice, cousin to Shallow.

PERSONA.NAME: Francis
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: A drawer at the Boar's Head Tavern.

PERSONA.NAME: Hostess Quickly
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Innkeeper of the Boar's Head Tavern in Eastcheap

PERSONA.NAME: Second Drawer
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Drawer at the Boar's Head Tavern

PERSONA.NAME: Will, the Drawer
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Drawer at the Boar's Head Tavern

PERSONA.NAME: Beadle
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Beats Hostess Quickly and Doll Tearsheet for their transgressions.
